item.title: Metaphysics - curated list
item.description: Metaphysics is the branch of philosophy that deals with the first principles of things, including abstract concepts such as being, knowing, identity, time, and space. This curated list of posts and videos addresses the following qurestions : What is life ? What is a thing ? What it consciouness ? What is the true essence of reality ? Is the universe consciouss ? Are we living in a simulation ?

item.title: Blockchain for research - curated list
item.description: Could blockchain : help science reproductibility ? enhance research transparency ? avoid publication fraud ? enhance datasets exchanges ? help to fund research projects ? incentivize scientists ? Let’s find out with a few lectures ! Blockchain ‘could help combat mistrust in scientific process’ Dash Puts Science Research On The Blockchain Academic publishing is ripe for disruption, and Dash seeks to prove a new paradigm.

item.title: Curated list of free geodata and softwares
item.description: Online map editors, data visualisation & various tools https://carto.com/ https://umap.openstreetmap.fr/fr/ https://epsg.io http://geojson.io/ Geocoding https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Nominatim Basemap providers & editors https://openmaptiles.org http://maps.stamen.com https://www.mapbox.com/ https://openaerialmap.org/ https://www.mapillary.com/ http://maperitive.net/ https://www.maptiler.com https://openmaptiles.org Leaflet basemaps providers list colorbrewer2.org Colorbrewer palettes making presentations with R R packages Leaflet for R [Leaflet additional features()]https://bhaskarvk.github.io/leaflet.extras/) Raster manipulation Vector manipulation with sf Vector manipulation with sp Harvesting data from websites Querying osmdata with R Selenium server for R Design, fonts and icons http://colorbrewer2.
